body_html:
Actually, I missed these:

  • THNN_(im2col) and THNN_(col2im) in pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialFullDilatedConvolution.c
  • THNN_(vol2col) and THNN_(col2vol) in pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricFullDilatedConvolution.c

which looks like what we're looking for (and they support stride and dilation).
body_text:
Actually, I missed these:

THNN_(im2col) and THNN_(col2im)  in pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialFullDilatedConvolution.c
THNN_(vol2col) and THNN_(col2vol) in pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricFullDilatedConvolution.c

which looks like what we're looking for (and they support stride and dilation).
body:
Actually, I missed these:
- `THNN_(im2col)` and `THNN_(col2im)`  in [pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialFullDilatedConvolution.c]()
- `THNN_(vol2col)` and `THNN_(col2vol)` in [pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricFullDilatedConvolution.c]()

which looks like what we're looking for (and they support stride and dilation).
